attributes.action: Stop the closure of the confectionery stall at 16 Fambridge road, Maldon, Essex.
attributes.background: Maldon Council are trying to shut down this woman's shop due to a complain that they won't show her the evidence of. They have also decided that after 2 years of it being there that it's not in keeping with the local community.This needs to be stopped as she has all of the legal certs she needs.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
